Writing¶

NetCDF¶

This module is used to write data of an instance of the aprofiles.profiles.ProfilesData class as a NetCDF file.

aprofiles.io.write_profiles.write(profiles, base_dir, verbose)[source]¶

Writing method for an instance of a aprofiles.profiles.ProfilesData class.

Args:

  • aprofiles (aprofiles.profiles.ProfilesData): Object to be written.

  • base_dir (str): Base path of the file should be written.

  • verbose (bool): Verbose mode. Defaults to False.
